NAME.Nominative: Venerable Akakios of Sinai, mentioned in The Ladder (6th C)

SAINT.LIFE: The Monk Akakios of Sinai (VI Century): The account about him is located under 29 November.

LITURGY.TROPARION: O God of our fathers,/ deal with us ever according to Thy meekness./ Deprive us not of Thy mercy,/ but through their supplications// direct our life in peace.

LITURGY.KONTAKION: Forsaking the world, thou didst follow Christ from childhood,/ O all-wise and venerable Acacius,/ and, emulating His voluntary humility,/ thou didst cast down the prideful tyrant.// Pray thou unceasingly in behalf of us all.
